examples.translation: I use "millions" in daily conversations.
Can you explain the meaning of "millions"?

examples.example: Guru memberi contoh kalimat dengan kata "juta".
examples.translation: The teacher gave an example sentence with "millions".
In some contexts, "juta" can mean "millions".
In some contexts, "juta" can mean "millions (contextual)".
Compare "juta" with "puluh" to sense subtle differences.
Compare "juta" with "ratus" to sense subtle differences.

examples.example: Bentuk "jutanya" masih terkait dengan kata dasar "juta".
examples.translation: The form "jutanya" is still related to "millions".

examples.example: Bentuk "juta-ku" masih terkait dengan kata dasar "juta".
examples.translation: The form "juta-ku" is still related to "millions".

q&a.answer: Gunakan "juta" ketika ingin menyampaikan arti "millions" dalam konteks numbers > multipliers.
